page.title: 11Transport in Bexhill
page.content: Most people think that public transport in Bexhill is awful. The {trains}which run through Bexhill Central can take you directly to London(Victoria), Eastbourne, Brighton, Hastings, Ashford, Lewes and Gatwick Airport, to name just a few. It is a good service, with about four trains either way each hour. The{bus service}is pretty awful. The timetable does not link up with the train times. Cut in services have badly affected the buses, especially in the outlying areas. Some friends have set up a{community bus service}so that the old and disabled can reach the town centre more easily. Hastings and District (National Bus Company) run a few buses into and out of Bexhill, but the majority of the services are run by the Bexhill Corporation Bus Company.
